model.towers

Class CheapTower

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Entity
      • model.towers.Tower
        • model.towers.CheapTower

  • public class CheapTower
extends Tower
    The CheapTower class holds the CheapTower object. Low cost tower, but has very low damage.
    Author:
    Ethan Glasberg (glasberg@email.arizona.edu), Jarod Bristol (jarodkylebristol@email.arizona.edu), Alex Gonzalez (aegonzalez793@email.arizona.edu), Patrick Dearborn (pdearborn@email.arizona.edu)

    • Constructor Detail

      • CheapTower

        public CheapTower(int x,
                  int y,
                  int width,
                  int height,
                  int radius,
                  int rate,
                  int cost)
        Custom constructor for the CheapTower.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate were the tower will be placed
        y - the y coordinate were the tower will be placed
        width - the width of the tower
        height - the height of the tower
        radius - the enemy detection radius of the tower
        rate - the fire rate of the tower
        cost - how much the tower cost to buy

      • CheapTower

        Base constructor for the CheapTower.
